授業目的: This course aims at understanding the basics of business and economic data analysis. In this course, the students will learn various quantitative analysis tools such as mean, mode, median, variance, standard deviation, correlation, and regression analysis of time series, cross-sectional, and panel data. Simultaneously, the students will acquaint with some financial data analysis techniques such as ratio analysis, vertical and horizontal analysis, growth analysis, economic value-added, and prediction of bankruptcy of a firm.
到達目標: After the completion of the course, students will learn the application of statistical and financial tools and techniques for analyzing economic and financial data. The course is useful for any business students interested in understanding quantitative data analysis tools and techniques.
